entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
